title: What COVID-19 patients should know: Treatment, isolation, long-term effects
author: Parris Kane
description: Coronavirus case numbers continue to rise in Arkansas, and as more people contract the virus they may be wondering what to do. Health officials learn more about COVID-19every day, but it's hard to know what to expect until you actually have the virus. Dr. Jennifer Dillaha with the Arkansas Department of Health is urging people to take it very seriously. "People should not underestimate this disease, we are still learning a lot about it," Dr. Dillaha said.
